details.flavour: Live by the luck of the draw.
You never know what he'll pull out of thin air.
I've got an idea...
I don't know what I want, but I do want a lot of it.
Oh man, I've really Grobbled this one.

details.rules: Place 10 blue cards onto the table. Cast up to 8 of those Cards.
details.flavour: What we lack in quality we've made up with quantity.

details.rules: Place 5 cards of each rarity onto the table. Cast one Card of each rarity.
details.flavour: The greatest plans begin with simple tactics.

details.rules: Copy the last Blue card used by any character
details.flavour: This is how stupid you look, watch this.

details.rules: Copy the last Green card used by any character
details.flavour: Stop copying me. Stop copying me.

details.rules: Copy the last Red card used by any character
details.flavour: “Through others we become ourselves.” ― Mad Dog Millson, revered pirate and theif

details.rules: Return a Card with Blue Rarity to your hand
details.flavour: Don't retreat, reload.

details.rules: Return a Card with Green Rarity to your hand
details.flavour: Wanna see me do it again?

details.rules: Return a Card with Red Rarity to your hand
details.flavour: Cowboy's only load up 5 of the 6 bullet chambers. In the 6th chamber, they leave a hundred dollar bill to pay the undertaker.
Now, what do we have here...

details.rules: Place 5 blue cards onto the table. Cast up to 3 of those cards.
details.flavour: You criticize, I improvise

details.rules: Place 5 green cards onto the table. Cast up to 3 of those cards.
details.flavour: People will forget what you said, people will forget what you did, but people will never forget when you pulled out a fish in a fistfight.

details.rules: Place 5 red cards onto the table. Cast up to 3 of those cards.
details.flavour: Say goodbye to the rails, script, chain, wall, cuff, and beaten path.

details.rules: Place 3 green cards on the table. You may cast one of them.
details.flavour: No more of this bush league nonsense. We need some real power.

details.rules: Place 3 Red cards on the table. You may cast one of them.
details.flavour: I might be able to pull it off- but just this once.

details.rules: Place 3 Gold cards on the table. You may cast one of them.
details.flavour: Do you believe in miracles?
